name: Escape Combination
description:
WASD TO Move 

E To Use Power.

When  going Inside of the Cave you need to Press E(Timing is the Key) to Increase the number on the Timer.

Match the Number of the Timer on Top left to Bottom Right to End the Game.

All digits on the Timer has Different Numbers and All caves has Different coloured Fire.

Figure out a Way to Match the Numbers.

When you DO so The last Cave will Appear and you need to use your power there to Complete the Game.  

Made By:
